original_text: Jesus answered, ‘You could have no power against me unless God had given it to you. So the man who sold me to you has done a worse thing than you have done.’
korean_text: 예수께서 대답하시되 위에서 주지 아니하셨더라면 나를 해할 권한이 없었으리니 그러므로 나를 네게 넘겨 준 자의 죄는 더 크다 하시니라

sentences.original_text: You could have no power against me
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 나를 대적할 권세가 없었을 것이다

sentences.original_text: unless God had given it to you
So the man who sold me to you
